abstract: Richard Tarlowe, head of the complex frauds and cybercrime unit at the United States attorney’s office in Manhattan, will focus on white-collar criminal defense, digital security and foreign corrupt practices cases.

headline.main: Federal Prosecutor Who Fought Wall Street Is Joining Paul Weiss Law Firm
headline.print_headline: Federal Prosecutor Who Fought Wall Street Is Joining Paul Weiss Law Firm

snippet: Richard Tarlowe, head of the complex frauds and cybercrime unit at the United States attorney’s office in Manhattan, will focus on white-collar criminal defense, digital security and foreign corrupt practices cases.
